name: Gold Party
description:
Fly on a jet pack while dodging platforms in a cyber world. Steal gold from helicopters by travelling into the past before the crates were closed (fly into them). I made this in 10 hours because of procrastination.

v1.1 - Two player and fixed the bug where you could not see your score and highscore on certain resolutions.


Controls:

Space - Time Travel (& Slow Mo)

P1:

W - Fly (Jetpack)

A - Move Left or Steer Jetpack Left

D - Move Right or Steer Jetpack Right

P2:

Arrow keys - Fly, steer, and move
